bibl.title: ÉEmfvleÊein as a punishable offence
bibl.note: I. The Texts [P.S.I. XIII, 1357; P. Stras. 725]. - II. The Meaning of ἐμφωλεύω. [It refers to a neglect of duty, possibly a failure to perform it on time, thus impeding the smooth functioning of the administrative machinery].
bibl.seg: LEWIS Naphtali, Ἐμφωλεύειν as a Punishable Offense.
Symposion 1993. Vorträge zur griechischen und hellenistischen Rechtsgeschichte (Graz - Andritz, 12.-16. September 1993) (Köln - Weimar - Wien, 1994) pp. 219-224.

I. The Texts [P.S.I. XIII, 1357; P. Stras. 725]. - II. The Meaning of ἐμφωλεύω. [It refers to a neglect of duty, possibly a failure to perform it on time, thus impeding the smooth functioning of the administrative machinery].
